author: pawandhananjay
content: will post benchmarks with local testnets soon

author: pawandhananjay
content:
is this the config that we eventually plan to use for devnet 3? https://github.com/Inphi/eip4844-interop/blob/master/shared/chain-config.yml
it's a bit weird to have a preset which is not minimal or mainnet. On lighthouse, this would involve adding another preset configuration that we won't use anywhere else so it'd be a pain to maintain only for the devnets.
Any particular reason why we can't use mainnet/minimal presets? afaik, we have used mainnet presets for all merge and altair devnets

author: jimmygchen
content:
I think there were some issues getting minimal presets to run earlier (cc <@159152274659082240> ), probably just need some investigation there. Another reason for not using minimal was `FIELD_ELEMENTS_PER_BLOB` (4) conflicts with whats been used in execution (4096)
so we could probably stick with mainnet preset, unless we really need the lower `SLOTS_PER_EPOCH` ?
